###About me:

I'm not good at writing descriptions so do include your own awesome adjectives here.. I'm just this guy who likes to program ,mostly watch the repos on github and spend time being amazed  though. Node was awesome,then i was like coffeescript was awesome,then i was like jade was awesome ,then batmanjs was awesome and then digged inside out on few things and still digging to find a sweet spot for me to start something awesome too,i do a day job at wipro technologies as a unix app developer (project engineer).
